description.EN: Reduces the number of times you take poison damage.
description.CN: 减少受到中毒伤害的次数

description.EN: Greatly reduces the number of times you take poison damage.
description.CN: 大幅减少受到中毒伤害的次数

description.EN: Reduces the effects of weak monster roars.

description.EN: Items affect nearby allies with 33% of their efficacy.
description.CN: 给予周围的同伴1/3的效果

description.EN: Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 33% of their efficacy.
description.CN: 给予大范围内的同伴1/3的效果

description.EN: Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.

description.EN: Removes one cycle from the sharpening process.
Removes two cycles from the sharpening process.
Removes three cycles from the sharpening process.
Lets you digest blue mushrooms and toadstools.
description.CN: 已可食用蓝蘑菇与毒菇

description.EN: Additionally lets you digest mandragoras, devil's blight, and exciteshrooms.
description.CN: 追加可食用曼陀罗、鬼硝化伞菇与心跳加速菇

description.EN: Increases the time window for reeling in fish, and makes it easier to catch large fish.
description.CN: 延长钓起鱼的时间，就更容易钓起大鱼

description.EN: Increases movement speed while transporting and reduces downtime on landings.
description.CN: 搬运时的移动速度提上升，减轻着地时的反作用力

description.EN: Speeds up gathering and prevents knockbacks while gathering.
description.CN: 采集行动时，速度上升&硬直无效

description.EN: While active, reduces damage taken by 15%.

description.EN: One extra consumable herb item per gather.
description.CN: 草系消耗道具的取得数+1

description.EN: One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, or seed item per gather.
description.CN: 追加实、种系消耗道具的取得数+1

description.EN: One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, or insect item per gather.
description.CN: 追加虫系消耗道具的取得数+1

description.EN: One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, insect or mushroom item per gather.
description.CN: 追加菇系消耗道具的取得数+1

description.EN: Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles.
description.CN: 骸骨采集点的采集次数+1

description.CN: 追加特产采集点的采集次数+1

description.EN: Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles, gathering points, and mining outcrops.
description.CN: 追加矿石采掘点的采集次数+1

description.EN: Increases the loading capacity for slinger ammo collected from the ground or plants.
description.CN: 小幅增加在地面或植物取得的弹药装填数

description.CN: 再小幅增加一部分怪物掉落的弹药装填数

description.EN: In addition, increases the loading capacity for all slinger ammo dropped by monsters.
description.CN: 再小幅增加所有怪物掉落的弹药装填数

description.EN: Makes it slightly easier for monsters to lose sight of you.
Makes it moderately easier for monsters to lose sight of you.
Makes it much easier for monsters to lose sight of you.

description.CN: 使后仰无效。操虫棍萃取效果部分效果上升。

description.EN: Prevents standard knockbacks. Tripping is reduced to a knockback. Increases some Kinsect extract effects.
description.CN: 使后仰无效。将屁股着地减轻为后仰状态。操虫棍萃取效果部分效果上升。

description.EN: Prevents knockbacks and tripping. Increases some Kinsect extract effects.
description.CN: 使后仰、屁股着地无效。操虫棍萃取效果部分效果上升。
加快蹲下时的移动速度

description.EN: Increases your evade window and prevents lowered movement speed.
description.CN: 移动速度不会减慢，回避性能上升

description.EN: Greatly increases your evade window and prevents lowered movement speed.
description.CN: 移动速度不会减慢，回避性能更加上升

description.EN: Reduces stamina depletion while climbing by 50%.
Increases the success rate of flash effects.
Speeds up progress on research levels and special investigations.
description.CN: 更容易调查及研究大型怪物

description.EN: Increases the chances of a corpse being left behind.
Greatly increases the chances of a corpse being left behind.
description.CN: 残骸保留的几率大幅提高

description.EN: Makes it so corpses will always be left behind.

description.CN: 大幅减轻瘴气侵蚀的影响
取得痕迹时的槽上升量1.5倍

description.EN: Increases the likelihood of rare gathering points respawning.
Marks rare sites on the wildlife map.
Makes it easier to cook well-done steaks.
Discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.
description.CN: 即使被发现也不容易进入战斗状态

description.EN: Highly discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.
description.CN: 即使被发现也几乎不会进入战斗状态

description.EN: Prevents monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.
description.CN: 即使被发现也不会变为战斗状态

description.EN: Regenerates your health as you continually attack a monster. Recovery varies by weapon.
Allows recovery to exceed the red portion of the health gauge.
Extends the duration of your poison's effect on monsters.
Temporarily reduces stamina depletion when health is at 40% or lower.
Increases elemental damage (fire, water, thunder, ice, dragon) when landing critical hits.
Prevents attacks from being deflected. Also shortens the distance before ammo and arrows reach maximum power.
Raises attack as your weapon loses sharpness. Also boosts ranged weapon melee attacks and odds of stunning.
Powers up non-elemental weapons you have equipped.
description.CN: 无属性武器的基础攻击力提高

description.EN: High chance of increased capture rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)
Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks.
Above a certain health threshold, you withstand an attack that would normally cart you (once only).
Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness during critical hits.
Halves sharpness loss. For bows and bowguns, shots have a chance not to expend coatings or ammo.
Increases abnormal status effect damage (paralysis, poison, sleep, blast) when landing critical hits.
Good chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)
Increases max bow charge level by one.
Adds a stun effect to draw attacks and slightly increases attack power.
Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening.
High chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)
Lets you carve one additional time. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)
Increases affinity by 40% as soon as the stamina gauge is full.
description.CN: 维持耐力计量表全满时，会心率+40%

description.EN: Greatly increases the effect duration of hunting horn melodies.
description.CN: 更加延长狩猎笛的旋律效果时间

description.EN: While active, increases attack power by 5%.
While active, increases attack power by 10%.
While active, increases attack power by 15%.

Raises the maximum level of the Slinger Capacity skill.

While active, reduces damage taken by 60%.
While active, reduces damage taken by 60%. Skill becomes easier to activate as well.

Continually attacking a monster activates Free Element/Ammo Up Lv2 and increases elemental damage.
